title: Event Horizon
text: When the Event Horizon, a spacecraft that vanished years earlier, suddenly reappears, a team is dispatched to investigate the ship.

title: The Thing
text: In remote Antarctica, a group of American research scientists are disturbed at their base camp by a helicopter shooting at a sled dog.

title: Kingdom of Heaven
text: A village blacksmith, Balian, joins his long-estranged father, Baron Godfrey, as a crusader on the road to Jerusalem.
